title: It's ok
text: Nice restaurant located a few meters from the Metaxourghio metro station. Friendly and welcoming staff, punctual service. The pork souvlaki was not bad but I ate better ones in Greece. Average prices.

title: Amazing
text:
Spectacular place where you can breathe the history of ancient Greece.
Entrance fee is 20€
Once in Athens you can't miss it.

title: Amazing
text:
Spectacular place where you can breathe the history of ancient Greece.
Entrance fee is 20€
Once in Athens you can't miss it.

title: Great meal
text: nice restaurant in the Monastiraki district, just a little way out of the tourist spots. Friendly and welcoming staff and prompt service. You can choose the fixed menu for 12 €. Really tasty food at cheap prices. Homemade dessert at the end of the meal. Go there and you won't be disappointed.

title: Good experience
text: Characteristic little restaurant in the heart of Monastiraki. Typical dishes of Greek cuisine. Efficient service, young, friendly and polite staff. Good food and complimentary sweet dessert at the end of the meal. Affordable prices.

title: Good experience
text: Very elegant cafe / restaurant right on the old Venetian harbor. Venue for tourists but also frequented by locals. Punctual and efficient service, professional and attentive staff, tasty food and average prices of the other restaurants in the area.

title: Good
text: Elegant restaurant on the seafront of Nea Chora with tables also on the marina. Attentive and punctual service, professional and kind staff. Choice between typical Cretan dishes and fish dishes. Tasty food and prices higher than average prices.

title: It's ok
text: Clean and tidy fast food/restaurant in the downtown of Chania. The pork gyros wasn't bad and the portion was generous. Friendly staff, quick service and affordable prices.

title: Awesome
text: One of the best restaurants in Kissamos. Located on Mavros beach this venue serves typical Cretan and Greek cuisine, often freshly caught fish available. The food is delicious and the prices are affordable. Free sun beds and umbrellas are available on the beach if you order just a drink from the restaurant. The owner, Themis, is a great guy, he makes you feel at home and treats you like a friend, not a customer. Thanks for everything Themis and best wishes to you and your family from Massi the bomber.

title: Stunning place
text: spectacular beach about 30 km from Kissamos. Clear and crystalline water, it seems to be in the tropics. Possibility to rent a sunbed and umbrellas at a cost of € 10. Not to be missed.

title: It's worthy
text: Nice, clean and tidy fast food/restaurant along the main road of Kissamos. Quick service, friendly staff and tasty food such as pita gyros at paltry prices.

title: Simply amazing
text: nice location right on the seafront. Very attentive and friendly staff, normal service. The meat dishes are truly stunning and at a paltry price. You cannot miss this place.

title: Nothing special
text: nice location on the seafront. Very fresh and tasty fish. Rough service and not very friendly staff. A little expensive prices.

title: It's ok
text:
Nice and cozy restaurant just on the seaside. Quick service and kind staff.
Tasty food at affordable prices.
It's worth a visit.

title: It's good
text:
Informal grillhouse/restaurant on the main street in Malia. Kind staff and quick service. Good food such as the pita gyros and prices are really cheap.
It's worth a visit.

title: Good
text:
Informal eat-in/ take away restaurant on the main road of Malia. The chicken and pork souvlaki were really tasty. Quick service and cheap prices.
To be reccommended.

title: Amazing experience
text: Small, characteristic and family run restaurant just off the touristic spots of Malia. Welcoming and friendly staff and the food is delicious. The pork souvlaki was simply superb. At the end of the meal a small bottle of raki and a home made cake came as complimentary. Great food at reasonable price. Don't miss it!!!

title: Great experience
text: my first day in Malia and i was reccommended this place. What a surprise. Nice restaurant with a lovely terrace. Real cretan food, simply delicious, and generous portions. Staff are very friendly and careful. I'll be back sure.
